020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
023import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.checkState;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
030
031import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
032import java.lang.reflect.Modifier;
033import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
034import java.lang.reflect.Type;
035import java.util.ArrayList;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.Map;
038import java.util.Optional;
039
040import org.apiguardian.api.API;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
043import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec;
044import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ClassName;
045import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterizedTypeName;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeVariableName;
048
049/**
050 *  The implementation of
051 *  {@link TypeNameImpl}
052 *  for parameterised types.
053 *
054 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
055 *  @version $Id: ParameterizedTypeNameImpl.java 1065 2023-09-28 06:16:50Z tquadrat $
056 *  @since 0.0.5
057 *
058 *  @UMLGraph.link
059 */
060@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ParameterizedTypeNameImpl.java 1065 2023-09-28 06:16:50Z tquadrat $" )
061@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
062public final class ParameterizedTypeNameImpl extends TypeNameImpl implements ParameterizedTypeName
063{
064        /*------------*\
065    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
066        \*------------*/
067    /**
068     *  The enclosing type, if any.
069     */
070    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
071    private final Optional<ParameterizedTypeNameImpl> m_EnclosingType;
072
073    /**
074     *  The class name for this type.
075     */
076    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
077    private final ClassNameImpl m_RawType;
078
079    /**
080     *  The type arguments.
081     */
082    private final List<TypeNameImpl> m_TypeArguments;
083
084        /*--------------*\
085    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
086        \*--------------*/
087    /**
088     *  Creates a new {@code ParameterizedTypeNameImpl} instance.
089     *
090     *  @param  enclosingType   The optional enclosing type for this instance.
091     *  @param  rawType The class name for this instance.
092     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
093     */
094    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
095    public ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl enclosingType, final ClassNameImpl rawType, final List<? extends TypeNameImpl> typeArguments )
096    {
097        this( enclosingType, rawType, typeArguments, new ArrayList<>() );
098    }   //  ParameterizedTypeNameImpl()
099
100    /**
101     *  Creates a new {@code ParameterizedTypeNameImpl} instance.
102     *
103     *  @param  enclosingType   The optional enclosing type for this instance.
104     *  @param  rawType The class name for this instance.
105     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
106     *  @param  ignored The annotations.
107     */
108    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
109    private ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl enclosingType, final ClassNameImpl rawType, final List<? extends TypeNameImpl> typeArguments, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> ignored )
110    {
111        this( Optional.ofNullable( enclosingType ), rawType, typeArguments, new ArrayList<>() );
112    }   //  ParameterizedTypeNameImpl()
113
114    /**
115     *  Creates a new {@code ParameterizedTypeNameImpl} instance.
116     *
117     *  @param  enclosingType   The optional enclosing type for this instance.
118     *  @param  rawType The class name for this instance.
119     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
120     *  @param  annotations The annotations.
121     */
122    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
123    private ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( final Optional<ParameterizedTypeNameImpl> enclosingType, final ClassNameImpl rawType, final List<? extends TypeNameImpl> typeArguments, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations )
124    {
125        super( annotations );
126        m_RawType = requireNonNullArgument( rawType, "rawType" ).annotated( annotations.stream().map( a -> (AnnotationSpec) a ).collect( toList() ) );
127        m_EnclosingType = enclosingType;
128        m_TypeArguments = List.copyOf( requireNonNullArgument( typeArguments, "typeArguments" ) );
129
130        checkState( !m_TypeArguments.isEmpty() || enclosingType.isPresent(), () -> new ValidationException( "no type arguments: %s".formatted( rawType ) ) );
131        for( final var typeArgument : m_TypeArguments )
132        {
133            checkState( !typeArgument.isPrimitive() && (typeArgument != VOID_PRIMITIVE), () -> new ValidationException( "invalid type parameter: %s".formatted( typeArgument ) ) );
134        }
135    }   //  ParameterizedTypeNameImpl()
136
137        /*---------*\
138    ====** Methods **==========================================================
139        \*---------*/
140    /**
141     *  {@inheritDoc}
142     */
143    @Override
144    public final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl annotated( final List<AnnotationSpec> annotations )
145    {
146        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( m_EnclosingType, m_RawType, m_TypeArguments, concatAnnotations( annotations ) );
147
148        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
149        return retValue;
150    }   //  annotated()
151
152    /**
153     *  {@inheritDoc}
154     */
155    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
156    @Override
157    public final CodeWriter emit( final CodeWriter out ) throws UncheckedIOException
158    {
159        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( out, "out" );
160        if( m_EnclosingType.isPresent() )
161        {
162            m_EnclosingType.get().emit( retValue );
163            retValue.emit( "." );
164            if( isAnnotated() )
165            {
166                retValue.emit( " " );
167                emitAnnotations( retValue );
168            }
169            retValue.emit( m_RawType.simpleName() );
170        }
171        else
172        {
173            m_RawType.emit( retValue );
174        }
175
176        if( !m_TypeArguments.isEmpty() )
177        {
178            retValue.emitAndIndent( "<" );
179            var firstParameter = true;
180            for( final var parameter : m_TypeArguments )
181            {
182                if( !firstParameter ) retValue.emitAndIndent( ", " );
183                parameter.emit( retValue );
184                firstParameter = false;
185            }
186            retValue.emitAndIndent( ">" );
187        }
188
189        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
190        return retValue;
191    }   //  emit()
192
193    /**
194     *  Returns a parameterised type, applying the given type arguments to the
195     *  given raw type.
196     *
197     *  @param  rawType The class name for the new type.
198     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
199     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
200     */
201    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
202    public static final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl from( final Class<?> rawType, final Type... typeArguments )
203    {
204        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( null, (ClassNameImpl) ClassName.from( rawType ), list( typeArguments ) );
205
206        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
207        return retValue;
208    }   //  from()
209
210    /**
211     *  Returns a parameterised type, applying the given type arguments to the
212     *  given raw type.
213     *
214     *  @param  rawType The class name for the new type.
215     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
216     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
217     */
218    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
219    public static final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl from( final ClassName rawType, final TypeName... typeArguments )
220    {
221        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( null, (ClassNameImpl) rawType, stream( requireNonNullArgument( typeArguments, "typeArguments" ) ).map( t -> (TypeNameImpl) t ).collect( toList() ) );
222
223        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
224        return retValue;
225    }   //  from()
226
227    /**
228     *  Returns a parameterised type equivalent to the given type, with the
229     *  given type arguments added.
230     *
231     *  @param  type    The other type.
232     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
233     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
234     */
235    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
236    public static final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl from( final ParameterizedType type, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeArguments )
237    {
238        final var rawType = (ClassNameImpl) ClassName.from( (Class<?>) type.getRawType() );
239        final var ownerType = (type.getOwnerType() instanceof ParameterizedType) && !Modifier.isStatic( ((Class<?>) type.getRawType()).getModifiers() ) ? (ParameterizedType) type.getOwnerType() : null;
240        final var typeArgumentList = TypeNameImpl.list( type.getActualTypeArguments(), typeArguments );
241        final var retValue = nonNull( ownerType )
242            ? from( ownerType, typeArguments ).nestedClass( rawType.simpleName(), typeArgumentList.stream().map( t -> (TypeName) t ).collect( toList() ) )
243            : new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( null, rawType, typeArgumentList );
244
245        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
246        return retValue;
247    }   //  from()
248
249    /**
250     *  Returns a parameterised type, applying the given type arguments to the
251     *  given raw type.
252     *
253     *  @param  rawType The class name for the new type.
254     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
255     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
256     *
257     *  @deprecated Use
258     *      {@link #from(Class, Type...)}
259     *      instead.
260     */
261    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
262    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
263    public static final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl get( final Class<?> rawType, final Type... typeArguments )
264    {
265        final var retValue = from( rawType, typeArguments );
266
267        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
268        return retValue;
269    }   //  get()
270
271    /**
272     *  Returns a parameterised type, applying the given type arguments to the
273     *  given raw type.
274     *
275     *  @param  rawType The class name for the new type.
276     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
277     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
278     *
279     *  @deprecated Use
280     *      {@link #from(ClassName, TypeName...)}
281     *      instead.
282     */
283    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
284    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
285    public static final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl get( final ClassName rawType, final TypeName... typeArguments )
286    {
287        final var retValue = from( rawType, typeArguments );
288
289        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
290        return retValue;
291    }   //  get()
292
293    /**
294     *  Returns a parameterised type equivalent to the given type.
295     *
296     *  @param  type    The other type.
297     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
298     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
299     *
300     *  @deprecated Use
301     *      {@link #from(ParameterizedType)}
302     *      instead.
303     */
304    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
305    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
306    public static ParameterizedTypeName get( final ParameterizedType type, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeArguments  )
307    {
308        final var retValue = from( type, typeArguments );
309
310        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
311        return retValue;
312    }   //  from()
313
314    /**
315     *  {@inheritDoc}
316     */
317    @Override
318    public final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl nestedClass( final CharSequence name )
319    {
320        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( this, m_RawType.nestedClass( requireNonNullArgument( name, "name" ) ), new ArrayList<>(), new ArrayList<>() );
321
322        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
323        return retValue;
324    }   //  nestedClass()
325
326    /**
327     *  {@inheritDoc}
328     */
329    @Override
330    public final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl nestedClass( final CharSequence name, final List<TypeName> typeArguments )
331    {
332        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( this, m_RawType.nestedClass( requireNonNullArgument( name, "name" ) ), typeArguments.stream().map( t -> (TypeNameImpl) t ).collect( toList() ), new ArrayList<>() );
333
334        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
335        return retValue;
336    }   //  nestedClass()
337
338    /**
339     *  {@inheritDoc}
340     */
341    @Override
342    public final ClassNameImpl rawType() { return m_RawType; }
343
344    /**
345     *  {@inheritDoc}
346     */
347    @Override
348    public final List<TypeName> typeArguments()
349    {
350        final var retValue = m_TypeArguments.stream()
351            .map( typeArgument -> (TypeName) typeArgument )
352            .toList();
353
354        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
355        return retValue;
356    }   //  typeArguments()
357
358    /**
359     *  {@inheritDoc}
360     */
361    @Override
362    public final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl withoutAnnotations()
363    {
364        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( m_EnclosingType, m_RawType.withoutAnnotations(), m_TypeArguments, new ArrayList<>() );
365
366        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
367        return retValue;
368    }   //  withoutAnnotations()
369}
370//  class ParameterizedTypeNameImpl
371

373 *  End of File
